name: Avalugg
text: Avalugg has the highest defense of all ice-type pokemon... which isn't saying that much, unfortunately.

name: Tokutek
text: Tokutek claim to improve MongoDB performance 20x. It is unclear whether this also means losing 20x as many documents.

name: Adabas
text: ADABAS was NoSQL from time when there was no SQL. Technology now is own by Software AG. "Software AG: We're not sure what we do either."

name: Feebas
text: The inner beauty of the Feebas is unleashed if its Trainer truly believes in it.

name: Azurill
text: Azurill's tail is large and bouncy. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.

name: Hadoop
text: Hadoop is distributed system for counting words.

name: Vulpix
text: Munchlax is a great counter to Vulpix, being able to take four Fire Blasts from the Life Orb set and hit back hard with Earthquake or STAB Return.

name: Hekaton
text: Refer to lock-free architecture for SQL Server 2014. no to be confuse with Magneton the levitating Pokémon.

name: Staravia
text: Staravia flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stay within a huge flock.

name: Summingbird
text: This Twitter technology combines streaming, MapReduce, Scalding, Scala and Storm. Potential users must prove they are hipsters before they are allowed to download.

name: Akiban
text: Touted as SQL database with object structured storage, Akiban was recently acquired by FoundationDB, another database vendor you never have heard of.

name: Arbok
text: Despite reports to the contrary, Arbok does not evolve into Seviper.

name: Arvados
text: Not to be confused with Ariados. Spins a web of microservices around unsuspecting sysadmins.
